sentences.sContent: Candidates from all three parties were out canvassing in Darlington today.
sentences.sCn: 三个政党的候选人今天都在达灵顿拉选票。

sentences.sContent: The US has been canvassing support from other Asian states.
sentences.sCn: 美国一直游说其他亚洲国家，寻求支持。

remMethod.val: 在帆布(canvas)上写上标语来拉选票(canvass)

trans.tranCn: 游说， 拉选票； 细查
trans.tranOther: to try to persuade people to support a political party, politician, plan etc by going to see them and talking to them, especially when you want them to vote for you in an election
